Articles.Content: So i was thinking, and i thought that a really cool idea would be to implement multiplayer support into Kerbal. Maybe have a world with 2 launch facilities, and both players try to race to completing a task? Thought it might be interesting if it were able to be implemented.
They are already working on it. Furthermore there is a mod in development that does MP, if you want to try it now.

Please be advised that Multiplayer is both a planned feature, and also one of the many items on our handy-dandy [thread=36863]What Not to Suggest List[/thread]. As such, unless you have some suggestions on exactly how it could be implemented, it's kind of re-hashing the same old territory again just suggesting multiplayer. There is at least one thread kicking around here dealing with some of that already, too.

In light of that, thread closed.
